New Records: Shakib Al Hasan became the sixth Asian batter to complete 2,500 T20I runs
Key Match Events: Shakib Al Hasan scored an unbeaten 64, his first fifty since October 2022
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh got off to a poor start after Netherlands won the toss and opted to bowl
Tanzid Hasan and Shakib Al Hasan added 48 runs for the third wicket
Towhid Hridoy suffered his first failure of the ongoing tournament
